name: Mini Yellow Raptor Hatchling
description:
Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine 2 Yellow and 1 Green Raptor with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a White.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 White Raptors with 12 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Silver.
